plot outline: A boy from an ordinary household is often told by his mother that their living conditions would get better once he becomes a big man. His wish to grow big is miraculously heard by a saint. Although the boy does turn big physically, mentally he continues to remain a boy. Unable to deal with this sudden change, he finds himself in a series of comical events.
title: Boss Have to Dhamaal
plot: A boy from an ordinary household is often told by his mother that their living conditions would get better once he becomes a big man. His wish to grow big is miraculously heard by a saint. Although the boy does turn big physically, mentally he continues to remain a boy. Unable to deal with this sudden change, he finds himself in a series of comical events.
